definition[0]: something that exists as a single and complete unit
example[0]: The mind exists as a separate entity.
example[1]: Good design brings a house and garden together as a single entity.
definition[1]: used to talk about any business that is a single unit from a legal or financial point of view
example[2]: The thrift was declared insolvent and merged with seven other Texas thrifts into a new entity.
definition[2]: the principle that a business is separate from the people who own it, so that they do not have to use their own money to pay the companyâ€™s debts
